upcoming.title: AI in Healthcare
upcoming.description: The first event under the AI+ series focusing on problem statements in medical AI. Participants work on detecting pneumonia from chest X-rays using deep learning techniques.

upcoming.title: Bioforge: The Biomimetics Challenge (Algodoo)
upcoming.description: KBG and Yantrik Club present BIOFORGE, a biomimetic design challenge using Algodoo. Teams design motile mechanisms inspired by biology to traverse obstacle courses under simulated constraints.

upcoming.title: Cell Saga 2.0
upcoming.description: A thrilling scavenger hunt that brings together logic, biology, and teamwork. Race against time to uncover clues and reach the final frontier in this fun-filled event.

upcoming.title: Epidemic
upcoming.description: Step into the shoes of an epidemiologist. Model the spread of a virtual outbreak, analyze infection patterns, and develop intervention strategies to flatten the curve.

upcoming.title: HIVE
upcoming.description: Inspired by swarm intelligence, HIVE challenges participants to explore collective algorithms and develop decentralized problem-solving models inspired by nature.

upcoming.title: Pitch Terra
upcoming.description: Pitch Terra invites budding entrepreneurs to propose startups solving environmental problems through biotechnology and sustainability-driven innovation.

upcoming.title: Talk: Angad Singh
upcoming.description: A student interaction session on how nature forms complex biological patterns via signalling pathways and clocks. Led by Mr. Chandel Angad Singh, exploring careers and research in biocomplexity.

past.title: AI+PS2: Neuroheadstate – EyeState Classification
past.description: Participants decoded EEG signals to classify human eye states, exploring neural signal processing and machine learning in neuroscience.

past.title: AI × Bio
past.description: An introductory session exploring the convergence of artificial intelligence and biology through interactive discussions and medical dataset prediction exercises.

past.title: Bio-Forge: The Biomimetics Challenge
past.description: A competition combining engineering and biology where participants used Algodoo to simulate bio-inspired motion mechanisms.

past.title: Cell Saga
past.description: A fast-paced scavenger hunt combining biology and logic. The first edition that set the stage for the Cell Saga series.

past.title: Genetics 101
past.description: An introductory talk on genetic engineering, gene therapy, and ethical aspects of modern genetics.

past.title: Origin of Life
past.description: A session exploring scientific theories about life’s beginnings, from the Big Bang to RNA world hypotheses.

past.title: Talk: iGEM
past.description: A seminar introducing the international iGEM competition and the world of synthetic biology by Benjamin Schwetz.

past.title: SynBio 101
past.description: A hands-on iGEM-style competition where teams researched and pitched synthetic biology projects to a judging panel.
